name: XSSProtector
author: Brian Wolff
description: Extension to add an extra layer of protection against XSS attacks

XSSProtectorScriptless.description: Attempt to prevent scriptless XSS (Higher risk of clashing with extensions for not that much value). Disables <form> and <meta> tags.

XSSProtectorReplaceMessage.description: Disable dynamic replacement of Message class. This reduces protection but may be required for compatibility sometimes.

XSSProtectorLaxSpecialPage.description: Don't process the HTML parts of special pages
